ygData.subject: Re: Re: Monk Loot and Modifications
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That actually sounds like a good idea.  But at what level would these be available?  20? Perhaps have one for swifter punching too?  Fists of the Wind?
ygData.messageBody:
>Hello Fellow Monks,
>It is me again. This bit just gave me an idea. How about Monk
>specialization? something like pick a new skill such as "Fists like
>Stone", or "Bending Reed", which might seriously add to dodging. So fists
>of stone would dish out harder hits when the skill increases and bending
>reed might seriously cut on the damage and add to the swiftness and agility
>of Monks. But make it a choose one or the other type of special skill.
>Perhaps give us three or four skills to choose from. How about that? :o)
>Quan of Tribunal

That actually sounds like a good idea. But at what level would these be
available? 20?
Perhaps have one for swifter punching too? Fists of the Wind? Decreases
your delay by 1 every level? (up to a minimum of 15, or something?
